data.title: Introduction
description: You were going about your life as usual until one day when you fell asleep, you woke up in the Kingdom of Debauchia. You explored the new world and soon realised you had immense influence in this world and were universally attractive to all women. Seeing this you decide to take advantage and have some fun.
The Kingdom of Debauchia was currently undergoing a power struggle. The king had died a few days ago and all stakeholders in the Kingdom were trying to establish their own new order.
First there is the Aristocracy, a collection of land-owning nobles who seek to establish a semi democratic commonwealth where all nobles get to vote and elect a King of their choosing.
Second there is the Monarchy, under their Queen who seeks to retain the status quo and have the current Queen establish an autocratic monarchy with all citizens serving as her subjects.
Lastly, there is the Rebellion who seek to take advantage of the chaos to violently take over Kingdom and establish a democratic republic with universal sufferage for all citizens.

With your special abilities you have the chance to pick a side and decide the fate of the Kingdom of Debauchia. You will also obviously be able to have some fun with the beautiful ladies you meet along the way. (Your choices will determine what ending you get, so choose carefully.)
